item.title: Kiera add a quote by Emma Lou Thayne
item.description: "He answers privately, reaches my reaching. In my Gethsemane, Savior and Friend." -- Emma Lou Thayne

item.title: Kiera add a quote by Martin Luther King Jr.
item.description: "In the end, we will remember not the words of our enemies, but the silence of our friends." -- Martin Luther King Jr.

item.title: Kiera add a quote by Martin Luther King Jr.
item.description: "Not only will we have to repent for the sins of bad people; but we also will have to repent for the appalling silence of good people." -- Martin Luther King Jr.

item.title: Kiera add a quote by Martin Luther King Jr.
item.description: "Our lives begin to end the day we become silent about things that matter." -- Martin Luther King Jr.

item.title: Kiera add a quote by Barak Obama
item.description: "One voice can change a room, and if one voice can change a room, then it can change a city, and if it can change a city, it can change a state, and if it change a state, it can change a nation, and if it can change a nation, it can change the world. Your voice can change the world." -- Barak Obama
